name: Disc Diseases, Vertebrae Model
descr:
Disc Diseases, Vertebrae Model
 
This model shows the stages of disc diseases. Each single model consists of two vertebrae, discs and nerves.
 
Model 1 shows normal condition, model 2 a prolapsed disc. Model 3 and 4 show further damage of disc and vertebrae.
 
Each model can be detached from the stand separately.
